name: CGDisplayMode
desc: A reference to a display mode object.

items.name: var height: Int
items.desc: Returns the height of the specified display mode.

items.name: var ioDisplayModeID: Int32
items.desc: Returns the I/O Kit display mode ID of the specified display mode.

items.name: var ioFlags: UInt32
items.desc: Returns the I/O Kit flags of the specified display mode.

items.name: var refreshRate: Double
items.desc: Returns the refresh rate of the specified display mode.

items.name: var width: Int
items.desc: Returns the width of the specified display mode.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the type identifier of Quartz display modes.

items.name: func isUsableForDesktopGUI() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified display mode is usable for a desktop graphical user interface.
